content:
The Chicago Trolley Company's 90-minute guided tour is a popular and well-regarded option.

Regarding discounts and promotions, I've got some good news for you:

1. **Senior Discount**: Chicago Trolley Company offers a $5 discount for seniors (65+ years old) on their regular adult ticket price. Just make sure to mention the senior discount when booking or at the time of ticket purchase.
2. **Group Discounts**: They offer discounts for groups of 10 or more people. You can contact their group sales department directly to inquire about rates and availability.
3. **Online Discounts**: Keep an eye on their website for online promotions, special offers, or package deals. They sometimes offer discounts for advance bookings, student rates, or military personnel.
4. **Combination Packages**: Chicago Trolley Company occasionally offers combination packages that include their tour along with admission to other attractions or experiences. These packages can be a great way to save money and plan your itinerary.
5. **Coupon Codes**: Check websites like RetailMeNot, Coupons.com, or Groupon for any available coupon codes or promo codes that can be used on Chicago Trolley Company's website.

It's always a good idea to verify any discounts or promotions directly with the Chicago Trolley Company's customer service or website to ensure they are valid and applicable to your booking.

Additionally, consider purchasing tickets online in advance to avoid any potential same-day price increases.

I hope this helps you save some money and plan a fantastic tour for your parents!
